title: About Me
text: Sundarajan’s Profile Pic

title: Tools & Skills
text:
I’ve worked across tech stacks, business ops, and data pipelines — and here are the tools I trust to get the job done.




Python 🐍 — for data wrangling, modeling & automation (pandas, scikit-learn, matplotlib)

SQL 🧮 — for querying and manipulating structured data across complex schemas

Power BI 📊 — for dashboard design, KPI tracking, and visual storytelling

Tableau 📈 — for intuitive data exploration and presentation

PySpark ⚡ — for handling big data on distributed systems






Excel + VBA — OG combo for quick forecasting, reporting & macros

title: Projects
text:
A collection of real-world challenges I’ve tackled — using data, strategy, and creative problem-solving. Each one taught me something new and helped me connect dots across business, tech, and analytics.



Goal: Predict salaries based on job title, education level, and location.
Stack: Python (Pandas, Sklearn), SQL, Power BI
What I Did:
- Cleaned & engineered variables from raw survey data
- Built regression model with 85% R² accuracy
- Visualized role-based salary distribution and geographic variance
Impact: Enabled compensation benchmarking for HR use cases
🎯 Turned raw CSV into insight-packed dashboards + ML predictions




Approach: SWOT + PESTEL analysis to dissect one of the most talked-about policy failures
What I Did:
- Mapped stakeholder failures and blind spots
- Evaluated long-term risks and root causes using decision science
- Designed 3-phase recovery plan using project management strategies
Impact: Academic + practical framework for evaluating infrastructure breakdowns




Objective: Shift stakeholder attitudes to support app adoption
What I Did:
- Categorized stakeholders from “Unaware” to “Cheerleaders”
- Created an influence–interest matrix
- Aligned communication strategy to sentiment shifts
Outcome: Simulated user journey + engagement strategy using change management tools




Goal: Develop market entry strategy for low-cost solar kits in rural Africa
Stack: Excel, Market Research, Python (for NPV simulation)
What I Did:
- Segmented customers and modeled CAC/LTV
- Crafted pricing and channel strategy
- Built an NPV model for 3-year projection
Result: Strategy was shortlisted in a global social impact accelerator 💡

Let me know if you’d like these as downloadable PDFs or GitHub links added later.

title: About Me
text:
🧩 I’m That Rare Blend of…

🎯 Strategic Thinker → Ex-AGM @ BYJU’s, owned P&L and market expansion

💻 Tech Explorer → Python, SQL, Power BI, Tableau, PySpark

🧠 Academic Hustler → Dual master’s journey, research in AI, lifelong learner

🤝 People Leader → Built, mentored, and led cross-functional teams across regions

🧪 Decision Scientist → Passionate about solving fuzzy problems with sharp logic

title: About Me
text:
🎯 What Drives Me?
I’m obsessed with creating systems that scale — whether it’s a GTM playbook for a solar startup or a predictive salary model. I believe in blending storytelling + data + design to drive change.
My goals? - Help businesses see clearly, act faster, and grow smarter
- Work with global teams that value clarity, creativity, and courage
- Keep learning, keep building, and keep drinking good coffee ☕

title: About Me
text:
💬 Let’s Connect!
If you’re into transforming ideas into impact — whether through dashboards, growth hacks, or deep strategy dives — let’s chat!
Or if you just want filter coffee recos in Boston… I’ve got those too ☕😉

title: CV
text:
With over 7 years of business development and leadership experience — and a data-first mindset — I bring a unique ability to connect market strategy with analytics-driven execution.




🎓 Education

M.S. in Applied Business Analytics — Boston University (Ongoing)

B.E. in Computer Science — Saranathan College of Engineering, India

🧠 Certifications

Certified Scrum Master (CSM)

SQL for Data Science, Power BI Essentials

💼 Professional Experience

Assistant General Manager – BYJU’s

Led 140-member regional sales org, driving $4M+ YoY revenue

Implemented CRM strategies and forecasting models


Business Development Manager

Headed cross-functional growth across 3 regions

Managed P&L ownership, onboarding, and KPI tracking


🔬 Research Assistant @ BU

Working on AI-based predictive analytics in healthcare

Experience with PySpark, Jupyter, and cloud data processing
